details.title: NGSI source
details.description: Retrieve Orion Context Broker entities and their updates in real time.

preference.name: ngsi_server
preference.label: NGSI server URL
preference.description: URL of the Orion Context Broker to use for retrieving entity information

preference.name: ngsi_proxy
preference.label: NGSI proxy URL
preference.description: URL of the Orion Context Broker proxy to use for receiving notifications about changes

preference.name: use_user_fiware_token
preference.label: Use the FIWARE credentials of the user
preference.description: Use the FIWARE credentials of the user logged into WireCloud. Take into account this option cannot be enabled if you want to use this widget in a public workspace as anonoymous users doesn't have a valid FIWARE auth token. As an alternative, you can make use of the "Use the FIWARE credentials of the workspace owner" preference.

preference.name: use_owner_credentials
preference.label: Use the FIWARE credentials of the workspace owner
preference.description: Use the FIWARE credentials of the owner of the workspace. This preference takes preference over "Use the FIWARE credentials of the user". This feature is available on WireCloud 0.7.0+ in a experimental basis, future versions of WireCloud can change the way to use it making this option not funcional and requiring you to upgrade this operator

preference.name: ngsi_entities
preference.label: NGSI entity types
preference.description: A comma separated list of entity types to use for filtering entities from the Orion Context broker. This field cannot be empty.

preference.name: ngsi_id_filter
preference.label: Id pattern
preference.description: Id pattern for filtering entities. This preference can be empty, in that case, entities won't be filtered by id.

preference.name: ngsi_update_attributes
preference.label: Monitored NGSI Attributes
preference.description: Attributes to monitor for updates. Currently, the Orion Context Broker requires a list of attributes to monitor for changes, so this field cannot be empty.
preference.default: Latitud, Longitud, presence, batteryCharge, illuminance, ActivePower, ReactivePower, electricPotential, electricalCurrent

outputendpoint.name: entityOutput
outputendpoint.label: Provide entity
outputendpoint.description: Every change over each entity fires an event
